game.name: Sonki's Lagoon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dive into Sonki's Lagoon, a colorful low-poly high speed 3D platformer, inspired by the classic. Explore a fun world, pull of stylish moves and discover secrets in this indie adventure!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into Sonki's Lagoon, a colorful low-poly high speed 3D platformer, inspired by the classic. Explore a fun world, pull of stylish moves and discover secrets in this indie adventure!
